#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}



int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {

  RaftServer &svr = GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t insertIndex = 0;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  bool success = false;
  // comment for submit
    /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it. */
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;
  success = svr.Start(cmd, &insertIndex, &term);
  if (!success) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  auto ev = WaitForCommit(svr, insertIndex);
  ev->Wait(200 * HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL); // 10s
  if (ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  uint64_t res = ev->get();
  if (!res) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  RaftServer &svr = GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t insertIndex = 0;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  bool success = false;

  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;
  
  success = svr.Start(cmd, &insertIndex, &term);
  if (!success) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  auto ev = WaitForCommit(svr, insertIndex);
  ev->Wait(200 * HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL); // 100s
  if (ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  uint64_t res = ev->get();
  if (!res) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }






  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  RaftServer &svr = GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t insertIndex = 0;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  bool success = false;

  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);

  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;
  
  success = svr.Start(cmd, &insertIndex, &term);

  if (!success) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  auto ev = WaitForCommit(svr, insertIndex);
  ev->Wait(200 * HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL); // 10s
  if (ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  uint64_t res = ev->get();
  if (!res) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }


  string val = s->data_.at(3); // might error, we'll see
  *v = val;
  

  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> KvServer::WaitForCommit(RaftServer& svr,  uint64_t insertIndex) {
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    Coroutine::CreateRun([this, ev, &svr, insertIndex]() {
      uint64_t retries = 0;
      bool committed = false;
      while (retries < 100) {
        Coroutine::Sleep(HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL * 2); // wait 200ms
        svr.mtx_.lock();

        if (svr.vs.lastApplied >= insertIndex) {
          committed = true;
          svr.mtx_.unlock();
          break;
        }

        retries++;
        svr.mtx_.unlock();
      }

      if (committed) {
        ev->Set(1);
      }
      else {
        ev->Set(0);
      }
    });
    return ev;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(kv_mtx);
  string oid = v->data_.at(0);
  string op = v->data_.at(1);
  
  if (op.compare("put") == 0) {
    string k = v->data_.at(2);
    string val = v->data_.at(3);
    kv[k] = val;
  }
  else if (op.compare("get") == 0) {
    string k = v->data_.at(2);
    string val = kv.at(k); // can error
    v->data_.push_back(val);
  }
  else if (op.compare("append") == 0) {
    string k = v->data_.at(2);
    string arg = v->data_.at(3);

    if (kv.count(k) > 0) {
      string current_val = kv.at(k);
      kv[k] = current_val + arg;
    }
    else {
      kv[k] = arg;
    }
  }
  else {
    Log_debug("Invalid op %s", op);
  }


}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
